import Mathlib

variable {X : Type*} {Î¹ : Sort*} (T : Î¹ â†’ TopologicalSpace X)

/-- For a family of topologies T_i on X, the intersection of their open sets defines a
    topology which is the largest topology contained in all the T_i. -/
theorem exists_unique_largest_topology_contained_in_all :
  âˆƒ! (t : TopologicalSpace X),
    (âˆ€ i s, @IsOpen X t s â†’ @IsOpen X (T i) s) âˆ§
    (âˆ€ t', (âˆ€ i s, @IsOpen X t' s â†’ @IsOpen X (T i) s) â†’ (âˆ€ s, @IsOpen X t s â†’ @IsOpen X t' s)) := by
  sorry
